title: Center for Digital Inquiry and Learning
text: The University of Idaho's Center for Digital Inquiry and Learning fosters collaborative digital scholarship across a variety of disciplines.
alt: man riding a horse in rodeo with rainbow flag

title: Special Collections and Archives
text: Specializes in the acquisition, preservation, and accessibility of archival research materials that document the history and culture of Idaho and the University of Idaho.

title: New: PSES Collection
text: Materials from the Plant, Soil, and Entomological Sciences records show images of a variety of insects and parasites which were photographed between the 1930s and 1960s.

title: New: Crabtree Lithic Collection
text: A unique representation of Donald Crabtree's lifelong work with lithic technology, featuring flintknapped artifacts, archival documents, and native perspectives.
alt: hand holds colorful stone projectile point

title: Featured: Campus Photographs Collection
text: Over 3000 photographs from Special Collections depicting the University of Idaho campus, buildings, and people.
alt: sepia photograph of formal administration building with trees in front
